title: 'No plan to introduce cryptocurrency', MoS Finance informs Rajya Sabha - DNA India
content: 'No plan to introduce cryptocurrency', MoS Finance informs Rajya Sabha  DNA India
description: 'No plan to introduce cryptocurrency', MoS Finance informs Rajya Sabha - Finance State Minister Pankaj Chaudhary said that there is no plan to introduce a cryptocurrency and currently it is unregulated in India,
